page.title: 14Health in Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: The health centre has been open since 1976.Altogether there are 26 staff:1 practice nurse,4 doctors,3 cleaners,2 midwives,6 district nurses,a manager and 9 receptionists.The health centre also has a health team.The area covered by the centre is:Sherburn-in- Elmet,South Milford,Monk Fryston Ullerskelf,Towton and Biggin.In the health centre there are about 20 rooms.The baby clinic is in 4 rooms downstairs.The other rooms are mainly for storing stronge medicines.On a Sunday if the nurse is not there the doctor will take her place.The employees in the health centre work 8 hour shifts.The centre was specially built for the doctors to work from and is situated on Finkle Hill.There are two dental surgeries in the main street and a child welfare clinic in Moor Lane.
